metadata.name: Arechi NFT #1
metadata.description: The land was once a thriving civilization, but The Cataclysm had reduced it to a barren wasteland. Young and old turned on each other and were forced to fend for themselves in this new world, where resources were scarce and death lurked around every corner. The mechs ruled the wasteland, and only the most skilled pilots could withstand the lifeless landscape. Those who couldn't were brutally slaughtered and looted. In a world where life and death hang on a knife's edge and technological terrors dominate, who will come out on top?
